mail.payment.success.subject: You paid for a task on Gitpay
mail.payment.success.content.main: You paid $ {{value}} for the task {{url}} on Gitpay. You are going to receive a receipt from the provider about this payment and you can assign this task to someone interested. He will send the solution until the date you defined.
mail.payment.assigned.subject: There is a new payment for a task that you were assigned to
mail.payment.assigned.content.main: Hello, a payment of $ {{value}} was added to the task {{url}}
mail.payment.assigned.content.secondary: You are now assigned to this task. Once finished, a bounty will be sent to your account
mail.payment.subject.error: We couldn't process the payment on Gitpay
mail.payment.content.error: Hello, we had an issue with your payment of ${{value}} for the task {{url}}
mail.assign.owner.subject: Someone is interested in a task that you created on Gitpay
mail.assign.owner.main: {{name}} is interested in the task {{url}}. You can contact him on {{email}} to know more.
mail.assign.owner.suggest: Suggested bounty: {{value}},  suggested date: {{suggestedDate}}, for learn: {{learn}}, comment: {{comment}}
mail.assign.owner.sec: You can assign this user for this task going in 'interested' tab and he will receive the bounty when the task is done.
mail.interested.owner.subject: You're interested in this task
mail.interested.main: You're interested to work in the task on Gitpay
mail.interested.owner.sec: The owner is going to be notified about your interested and you will receive a confirmation if he accepts your request
mail.assigned.subject: You were assigned for a task on Gitpay
mail.assigned.main: You were assigned to start this task on Gitpay: {{url}}
mail.assigned.message:
The project owner will get in touch to provide you more details about the kickstart.

The deadline for this task is: {{deadline}}.

This means that you have to send a solution until {{deadlineFromNow}}.

To start, follow these steps:

  • Fork this project
  • Follow the instructions to run locally
  • Develop a solution and keep in sync with the maintainer
  • Always be up to date to the main repository
  • For each project, a build is triggered and automated tests are executed
  • Send a Pull Request
  • We start a code review

Once your Pull Request is approved, you will receive a bounty in your account.
mail.assigned.error: We had an issue with some notifications about interested users for a task on Gitpay.
mail.assigned.nodate: No deadline was set for this task
mail.assigned.anytime: The time needed to finish this
mail.deadline.update.subject: The deadline for this task was updated
mail.assigned.update.intro: We updated the deadline for this task you're working at: {{url}}
mail.assigned.update.message:
The deadline is: {{deadline}}

This means that you have to send a solution until {{deadlineFromNow}}.

Please let us know if this is not enough so that we can review it.
mail.deadline.daysLeft.subject: Hello {{name}},
mail.deadline.update.error: We had a issue with some notifications about interested users for a task on Gitpay.
mail.status.subject: We updated the status of a task that you were interested on Gitpay.
mail.status.message.first: We updated the deadline for this task you're working at: {{url}}
mail.status.error: We had a issue with some notifications about interested users for a task on Gitpay
mail.transfer.new.subject.success: A new transfer was made for a task on Gitpay
mail.transfer.new.message.success: A transfer of $ {{value}} will be send for you for the task {{url}}
mail.transfer.notify.subject.success: A transfer was confirmed for a task on Gitpay
mail.transfer.notify.message.success: You confirmed a transfer of $ {{value}} for {{url}}
mail.transfer.error.subject: We had a issue sending a transfer for a task on Gitpay
mail.transfer.error.message: We had a issue with a transfer of $ {{value}} for this task: {{url}}
mail.transfer.missing.subject: Activate your account to receive transfers for your concluded tasks
mail.transfer.missing.message: You received a transfer from Gitpay, but you didn't activate your account yet, please activate your account at https://gitpay.me/#/profile/payment-options to receive your bounties
mail.transfer.invalid.message: To recieve a payment for your task, you need to activate your account in https://gitpay.me/#/profile/payment-options
mail.assign.remove.subject: You were unassigned to a task
mail.assign.remove.message:
You were unassigned for the task on Gitpay

The task owner sent the reason:

{{message}}
mail.invite.send.action: You were invited to work on a task on Gitpay :-)
mail.invite.send.message:
You were invited to work on this task {{url}} on Gitpay.

Title: {{title}}

Price: $ {{value}}

Discover more and apply to work on it!, just click on interested button, and you will be assigned by the owner

Message:

{{message}}

Why you received this e-mail?

Maybe you were invited because you already work on this project and are prefered by the maintainer to solve this task.
mail.assign.register.error: Someone is interested on a task but couldn't receive the e-mail
mail.webhook.payment.success.subject: You made a new purchase in your card from Gitpay
mail.webhook.payment.success.message:
A payment was made in your credit card for a task on Gitpay. When the task been concluded, the payment will be send for who you assigned.

Name on credit card: {{name}}

Last 4 digits: {{number}}
mail.webhook.payment.update.subject: The payment for this task was updated!
mail.webhook.payment.update.message: The payment of $ {{amount}} for a task on Gitpay was approved
mail.webhook.payment.approved.subject: The payment for your task was approved on Gitpay!
mail.webhook.payment.approved.message: The payment of $ {{amount}} for a task was approved.
mail.webhook.payment.unapproved.subject: The payment for a task that you made on Gitpay wasn't approved
mail.webhook.payment.unapproved.message:
The payment of $ {{amount}} for a task on Gitpay wasn't approved

Reason: {{reason}}

.
mail.webhook.payment.transfer.subject: There's a Gitpay transfer on the way!
mail.webhook.payment.transfer.message:
A transfer of $ {{amount}} was sent to your account and we will let you know when it's concluded.

This transfer is about the task {{url}} that you concluded.
There's a Gitpay transfer in transit to your account!

A transfer of {{currency}} {{amount}} is in transit to your account and we will let you know when concluded.

The estimation date to be transfered is {{date}}.
We had a issue with your payment on Gitpay
There's was a error to process the payment of {{currency}} {{amount}} for a task on Gitpay and we will try again later.
mail.webhook.payment.transfer.finished.s: A transfer from Gitpay was successfully deposited in your account!
mail.webhook.payment.transfer.finished.m:
We transfered {{currency}} {{amount}} for your account and you are goint to see it in your transactions as a payment from Gitpay.

The transfer was finished at {{date}}
